122 words written on Thu, Mar 27 2003

r.e.m.: final straw<blockquote>Now love cannot be called into question.

Forgiveness is the only hope I hold.

And love–love will be my strongest weapon.

I do believe that I am not alone.

For this fear will not destroy me.

And the tears that have been shed

It’s knowing now where I am weakest

And the voice in my head. In my head.

Then I raise my voice up higher

And I look you in the eye

And I offer love with one condition.

With conviction, tell me why.

Tell me why.

Tell me why.

Look me in the eye.

Tell me why.</blockquote>The link goes to a page where you can choose between Windows Media or Quicktime. Via the newly redesigned jeansandatshirt.
